title: What will happen if I am 16-years-old and cleared the NDA exam and 12th class and my result has time of 3 months? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am assuming that you have turned 16, and will turn 17 this year. You will be writing the NDA/NA exam this year. You are appearing for your class 12 boards next month. Definitely you are eligible 16½ to 19½ is the permissible age limit You are appearing in 12th std You will be allowed to attend the SSB for sure. Don't worry. Focus on your 12th std and SSB preparation. :)
